Enter your vote today!  Check out the new poll for the nbwrpg 
group:


Should Rowdy Wolf be killed off? 

  o No 
  o Yes, bring in Ancient Wing as the Vok "Messanger" 


To vote, please visit the following web page:

http://www.egroups.com/polls/nbwrpg 

Note: Please do not reply to this message. Poll votes are 
not collected via email. To vote, you must go to the eGroups 
web site listed above.

Thanks!
